sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.WFcalulationforReports</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>WFcalulationforReports</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var WFcalulationforReports = Class.create();
WFcalulationforReports.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},
    calculateDifferenceTSFandASF: function(sysId) {
        var tSFsubtractASF;
		gs.info("Test Report Script"+ sysId);
        var grbuilding = new GlideRecord('sn_wsd_core_building');
        grbuilding.addQuery('sys_id', sysId);
        grbuilding.query();
		gs.info("Test Report Script 1"+ sysId);
        if (grbuilding.next()) {
            var grcostCOllector = new GlideRecord('sn_wsd_core_cost_collector');
            grcostCollector.addQuery('sys_id', grbuilding.u_cost_collector);
			gs.info("Test Report Script 2"+ grbuilding.u_cost_collector);
            grcostCollector.query();
            if (grcostCollector.next()) {
                tSFsubtractASF = parseFloat(grbuilding.u_total_gross_square_feet) - parseFloat(grcostcollector.u_contract_sf);
            }
            grbuilding.setValue('u_difference_between_budiling_tsf_asf', tSFsubtractASF);
            grbuilding.update();
        }

    },
    type: 'WFcalulationforReports'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>K095291</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2024-01-11 12:22:21</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>b2f525ef97eb75507884f5ece053afd8</sys_id>

        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="">a208b07253201010b10bddeeff7b1281</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_b2f525ef97eb75507884f5ece053afd8</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2024-02-04 17:26:43</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
